scripts.prestart: rimraf dist && rimraf aot && npm run rename-dev && tsc && node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/css sass
scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && rimraf prod && rimraf aot && npm run rename-prod
scripts.build: npm run aot && npm run rollup && npm run sass
scripts.rename-dev: renamer --find "index.html" --replace "index.prod.html" * && renamer --find "index.dev.html" --replace "index.html" * && renamer --find "main.ts" --replace "main.prod" app/* && renamer --find "main.dev" --replace "main.ts" app/*
scripts.rename-prod: renamer --find "index.html" --replace "index.dev.html" * && renamer --find "index.prod.html" --replace "index.html" * && renamer --find "main.ts" --replace "main.dev" app/* && renamer --find "main.prod" --replace "main.ts" app/*
scripts.start-heroku: rimraf dist && rimraf app && rimraf aot && lite-server
